title: Aliens, Colonics, and Chia Pudding!
description:
Woke for pay…politically correct names for workout programs to virtue signal and capitalize on the diversity movement. Plus, our latest favorite things from healthy chia pudding to tv shows. And Jillian answers your questions on colonics, caffeine, calorie burning trackers and more. 

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

This Week’s Sponsors:

THIRDLOVE.com/JILLIAN for 20% off your first order

STRANDSHAIRCARE.com, promo code JILLIAN for 20% off a 1-time purchase

You can find new episodes of Keeping It Real: Conversations with Jillian Michaels, completely ad free, on Wondery+ https://wondery.app.link/jillian

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
